headline: Cactus Secures 65% Stake in BKR's Surface Pressure Control Business
summary: WHD completes the deal for 65% of Baker Hughes' SPC unit, forming a JV and expanding its global oilfield equipment footprint.

raw.headline: Cactus Secures 65% Stake in BKR's Surface Pressure Control Business
raw.summary: WHD completes the deal for 65% of Baker Hughes' SPC unit, forming a JV and expanding its global oilfield equipment footprint.

headline: Is Baker Hughes (BKR) Quietly Redefining Its Core Through These Latest Portfolio Moves?
summary: Baker Hughes has recently closed a joint venture with Cactus for its surface pressure control business and completed the sale of its Precision Sensors & Instrumentation line to Crane Company for US$1.15 billion, receiving US$344.5 million in cash from the joint venture and retaining a 35% equity stake. Together, these portfolio moves refocus Baker Hughes on higher-return areas while freeing substantial capital that can be redeployed across its energy technology and services platform. We’ll...

headline: Cactus (WHD) Soars 5.7%: Is Further Upside Left in the Stock?
summary: Cactus (WHD) witnessed a jump in share price last session on above-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions for the stock doesn't suggest further strength down the road.
